participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, loves music and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I did not finish college. My favorite movie is the last of the mohicans. My car is over 20 years old. My dad was a preacher.

participant_2.name: Jane
participant_2.personality: Passionate and friendly, enjoys sharing musical experiences with others.
participant_2.background: I am a musician. I wish I could spend more time at home. I have taken formal music lessons since I was 5. My best friend is in a band with me.

content.text: Hi, my name is John. I'm a musician.
Hi John, I'm Jane. I'm a musician too.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and sing.
Nice! I play guitar and bass.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different genres, but I'm mostly into rock and blues.
Me too! I love rock and blues. I also like to play some jazz and country.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn to play jazz.
It's a lot of fun. You should give it a try.
I will! What's your favorite band?
That's a tough question. I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say The Beatles.
The Beatles are great! They're one of my favorites too.
What's your favorite song by them?
It's hard to choose just one, but I think I'd have to say "Yesterday".
That's a great song. It's one of my favorites too.
What's your favorite instrument to play?
I love playing the guitar, but I also really enjoy playing the piano.
I've always wanted to learn to play the piano.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
I will! I'm glad we met.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
